title: Awesome List Updates on Aug 14, 2022
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Aug 14, 2022 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Micropython
items.content_text:
### Sensors / Barometer - Air and Water Pressure

*   [BMP390 (⭐3)](https://github.com/octaprog7/BMP390) - MicroPython module for BMP390 pressure & temperature sensor.
*   [BMP180 (⭐3)](https://github.com/octaprog7/BMP180) - MicroPython module for BMP180 pressure & temperature sensor.
items.content_html:
Sensors / Barometer - Air and Water Pressure

  • BMP390 (⭐3) - MicroPython module for BMP390 pressure & temperature sensor.
  • BMP180 (⭐3) - MicroPython module for BMP180 pressure & temperature sensor.

items.title: ElixirBooks
items.content_text:

*   [Elixir School](https://elixirschool.com/en)

items.title: Awesome Vite

items.title: Awesome Cli Apps
items.content_text:
### Development / Text Editors

*   [neovim (⭐91k)](https://github.com/neovim/neovim) - Modern vim.
*   [helix (⭐38k)](https://github.com/helix-editor/helix) -  Modal editor inspired by kakoune.
items.content_html:
Development / Text Editors

  • neovim (⭐91k) - Modern vim.
  • helix (⭐38k) - Modal editor inspired by kakoune.

items.title: Awesome Graphql
items.content_text:
### .NET / React

*   [EntityGraphQL (⭐441)](https://github.com/EntityGraphQL/EntityGraphQL) - library to build a GraphQL API on top of data model with the extensibility to bring multiple data sources together in the single GraphQL schema.
*   [ZeroQL (⭐305)](https://github.com/byme8/ZeroQL) - type-safe GraphQL client with Linq-like interface for C#
items.content_html:
.NET / React

  • EntityGraphQL (⭐441) - library to build a GraphQL API on top of data model with the extensibility to bring multiple data sources together in the single GraphQL schema.
  • ZeroQL (⭐305) - type-safe GraphQL client with Linq-like interface for C#

items.title: Awesome Neovim
items.content_text:
### Tree-sitter Supported Colorscheme / Diagnostics

*   [Mofiqul/adwaita.nvim (⭐260)](https://github.com/Mofiqul/adwaita.nvim) - Colorscheme based on GNOME Adwaita syntax with support for popular plugins.

### Dependency Management / Diagnostics

*   [Saecki/crates.nvim (⭐1k)](https://github.com/Saecki/crates.nvim) - Rust dependency management for `Cargo.toml`.

### Editing Support / Diagnostics

*   [gbprod/stay-in-place.nvim (⭐97)](https://github.com/gbprod/stay-in-place.nvim) - Neovim plugin that prevent cursor from moving when using shift and filter actions.
items.content_html:
Tree-sitter Supported Colorscheme / Diagnostics

  • Mofiqul/adwaita.nvim (⭐260) - Colorscheme based on GNOME Adwaita syntax with support for popular plugins.

Dependency Management / Diagnostics

  • Saecki/crates.nvim (⭐1k) - Rust dependency management for Cargo.toml.

Editing Support / Diagnostics

  • gbprod/stay-in-place.nvim (⭐97) - Neovim plugin that prevent cursor from moving when using shift and filter actions.

items.title: Awesome Nix
items.content_text:
### Development / Discovery

*   [dream2nix (⭐1.1k)](https://github.com/nix-community/dream2nix) - A framework for automatically converting packages from other build systems to Nix.
*   [rnix-lsp (⭐717)](https://github.com/nix-community/rnix-lsp) - A syntax-checking language server for Nix.

### Programming Languages / Rust

*   [crane (⭐1.1k)](https://github.com/ipetkov/crane) - A Nix library for building Cargo projects with incremental artifact caching.
items.content_html:
Development / Discovery

  • dream2nix (⭐1.1k) - A framework for automatically converting packages from other build systems to Nix.
  • rnix-lsp (⭐717) - A syntax-checking language server for Nix.

Programming Languages / Rust

  • crane (⭐1.1k) - A Nix library for building Cargo projects with incremental artifact caching.
